title: Consolidating California Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Glass House Group going public via Mercer Park SPAC. President and Co-Founder Graham Farrar joins us to talk consolidating California cannabis. Brand, product focused and control of the shelf space - consistently EBITDA positive, California's mature and immature market. Supply agreement with The Parent Company, plans for expansion; the Casamigos of cannabis. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
